narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Chca Bayshore LP is a Clinic/Center, Ambulatory Surgical provider based in Pasadena, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $46.9M in Medicaid payments across 473K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $46.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
